definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="damage">damage</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="199" y="71"><field name="trigger">entity_pre_hurt</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">"Before entity is hurt" should be the global trigger</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="item_istype"><field name="item_type">Axe</field><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">LivingHurtEvent event2 = (LivingHurtEvent) event;</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:damage</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amount</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amount</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="get_attribute"><field name="attribute">CUSTOM:AxeDamage</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">event2.setAmount((float) damage);</field></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
